original_text: Some people may tell you that you must always serve other people like a slave. They may tell you that you must worship angels. Do not let those people speak bad things against you. They like to talk a lot about the special things that God has shown them. They think that they are very clever. But their ideas only come from human minds.
korean_text: 아무도 꾸며낸 겸손과 천사 숭배를 이유로 너희를 정죄하지 못하게 하라 그가 그 본 것에 의지하여 그 육신의 생각을 따라 헛되이 과장하고

sentences.original_text: that you must always serve other people like a slave
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 항상 다른 사람들을 종처럼 섬겨야 한다고

sentences.original_text: Do not let those people speak bad things against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신에 대해 나쁜 말을 하는 것을 허용하지 마십시오

sentences.original_text: They like to talk a lot
about the special things that God has shown them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들에게 보여주신 특별한 것들에 대해

sentences.original_text: They think that they are very clever
But their ideas only come from human minds
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 생각은 인간의 마음에서만 나옵니다
